00122 template <class T>
00123 class EGS_PLANES_EXPORT EGS_PlanesT : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00124 
00125 protected:
00126 
00127     EGS_Float  *p;      
00128     EGS_Float  p_last;  
00129     EGS_Float  dp;
00130     int        n_plane; 
00131     bool       is_uniform;
00132     T          a;       
00133     //EGS_Vector last_x, last_u;
00134     //EGS_Float  last_d;
00135     //int        last_ir, last_irnew;
00136 
00137     void       checkIfUniform() {
00138                    is_uniform = true;
00139                    if( nreg == 1 ) { dp = p_last - p[0]; return; }
00140                    dp = p[1] - p[0];
00141                    for(int j=1; j<nreg; j++) {
00142                        EGS_Float dpj = p[j+1] - p[j];
00143                        if( fabs(dpj/dp-1) > 2e-5 ) {
00144                            is_uniform = false; break;
00145                        }
00146                    }
00147                };
00148 
00149 public:
00150 
00152     ~EGS_PlanesT() {
00153         if( nreg ) delete [] p;
00154     };
00155 
00159     EGS_PlanesT(int np, const EGS_Float *pos, const string &Name,
00160             const T &A) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A) {
00161         if( np > 0 ) {
00162             p = new EGS_Float [np];
00163             for(int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00164                 p[j] = pos[j]/a.length();
00165                 if( j > 0 ) {
00166                     if( p[j] < p[j-1] ) egsFatal("EGS_PlanesT::EGS_PlanesT: "
00167                       " plane positions must be in increasing order\n");
00168                 }
00169             }
00170             if( np > 1 ) { nreg = np-1; p_last = p[nreg]; n_plane = np-1; }
00171             else { nreg = 1; p_last = 1e15; n_plane = 0; }
00172         } else egsFatal("EGS_PlanesT::EGS_PlanesT: attempt to construct a "
00173                 "plane set with %d plane positions\n",np);
00174         checkIfUniform();
00175     };
00179     EGS_PlanesT(const vector<EGS_Float> &pos, const string &Name, const T &A) :
00180                          EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A) {
00181         int np = pos.size();
00182         if( np > 0 ) {
00183             p = new EGS_Float [np];
00184             for(int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00185                 p[j] = pos[j]/a.length();
00186                 if( j > 0 ) {
00187                     if( p[j] < p[j-1] ) egsFatal("EGS_PlanesT::EGS_PlanesT: "
00188                       " plane positions must be in increasing order\n");
00189                 }
00190             }
00191             if( np > 1 ) { nreg = np-1; p_last = p[nreg]; n_plane = np-1; }
00192             else { nreg = 1; p_last = 1e15; n_plane = 0; }
00193         } else egsFatal("EGS_PlanesT::EGS_PlanesT: attempt to construct a "
00194                 "plane set with %d plane positions\n",np);
00195         checkIfUniform();
00196     };
00200     EGS_PlanesT(EGS_Float xo, EGS_Float dx, int np, const string &Name,
00201                 const T &A) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A) {
00202         if( np < 1 ) egsFatal("EGS_PlanesT::EGS_PlanesT: attempt to construct"
00203             " a plane set with %d plane positions\n",np);
00204         if( dx <= 0 ) egsFatal("EGS_PlanesT::EGS_PlanesT: attempt to construct"
00205             " a plane set with a non-positive slice thickness %g\n",dx);
00206         p = new EGS_Float [np+1]; p[0] = xo;
00207         for(int j=0; j<np; j++) p[j+1] = p[j] + dx;
00208         nreg = np; p_last = p[nreg]; n_plane = np;
00209         is_uniform = true; dp = dx;
00210     };
00211 
00212     EGS_Float *getPositions() { return p; };
00213 
00217     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00218         EGS_Float xp = a*x;
00219         if( xp < p[0] || xp > p_last ) return false;
00220         return true;
00221     };
00222 
00223     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00224         EGS_Float xp = a*x;
00225         if( xp < p[0] || xp > p_last ) return -1;
00226         if( nreg == 1 ) return 0;
00227         //if( is_uniform ) { int res = (int) ((xp-p[0])/dp); return res; }
00228         return findRegion(xp,nreg,p);
00229     };
00230 
00231     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00232 
00233     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00234                   const EGS_Vector &u) {
00235         if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00236         double xp = a*x, up = a*u;
00237         EGS_Float t = 1e30;
00238         if( up > 0 ) t = (p_last-xp)/up;
00239         else if( up < 0 ) t = (p[0]-xp)/up;
00240         return t;
00241     };
00242 
00243     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00244             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00245         //EGS_Float d = 1e30; int res=ireg;
00246         //EGS_Float xp = a*x, up = a*u;
00247         double d = 1e35; int res=ireg;
00248         double xp = a*x, up = a*u;
00249         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00250             int dir = 0; bool warn=false; EGS_Float dist;
00251             if( up > 0 && ireg < n_plane ) {
00252                 d = (p[ireg+1]-xp)/up;
00253                 //if( xp <= p[ireg+1] ) d = (p[ireg+1]-xp)/up;
00254                 //else {
00255                 //    dist = xp - p[ireg+1]; d = 0;
00256                 //    if( dist > 2e-5 ) warn = true;
00257                 //}
00258                 dir = 1;
00259             }
00260             else if( up < 0 ) {
00261                 d = (p[ireg]-xp)/up;
00262                 //if( xp >= p[ireg] ) d = (p[ireg]-xp)/up;
00263                 //else {
00264                 //    dist = p[ireg] - xp; d = 0;
00265                 //    if( dist > 2e-5 ) warn = true;
00266                 //}
00267                 dir = -1;
00268             }
00269             /*
00270             if( warn ) {
00271                 egsWarning("In EGS_Planes::howfar(%s): particle is not"
00272                             " in region we think it is:\n",a.getType().c_str());
00273                 //egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) region=%d distance to plane=%g\n",
00274                 //        x.x,x.y,x.z,ireg,dist);
00275                 egsWarning("x=%g u=%g region=%d distance to plane=%g\n",
00276                         xp,up,ireg,dist);
00277             }
00278             */
00279             if( d > t ) res = ireg;
00280             else {
00281                 t = d; res = ireg + dir;
00282                 if( res >= nreg ) res = -1;
00283                 if( newmed ) {
00284                     if( res >= 0 ) *newmed = medium(res); else *newmed=-1;
00285                 }
00286                 if( normal ) { *normal = a.normal()*(-dir); }
00287             }
00288             return res;
00289         }
00290         if( xp <= p[0] && up > 0 ) { d = (p[0] - xp)/up; res = 0; }
00291         else if( xp >= p_last && up < 0 ) {
00292             d = (p_last - xp)/up; res = nreg-1;
00293         }
00294         else if( xp > p[0] && xp < p_last ) {
00295             // we think we are outside but we are inside.
00296             // hopefully a truncation problem with a particle
00297             // backscattered at a boundary
00298             if( xp-p[0] < 3e-5 && up > 0 ) { d = 0; res = 0; }
00299             else if( p_last-xp < 3e-5 && up < 0 ) { d = 0; res = nreg-1; }
00300         }
00301         if( d <= t ) {
00302             t = d; if( newmed ) *newmed = medium(res);
00303             if( normal ) if( up > 0 ) *normal = a.normal()*(-1.);
00304                          else         *normal = a.normal();
00305         }
00306         else res = -1;
00307         return res;
00308     };
00309 
00310     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00311         EGS_Float xp = a*x;
00312         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00313             EGS_Float t = xp - p[ireg];
00314             if( ireg+1 <= n_plane ) {
00315                 EGS_Float t2 = p[ireg+1] - xp;
00316                 if( t2 < t ) t = t2;
00317             }
00318             return t;
00319         }
00320         if( xp <= p[0] ) return p[0] - xp;
00321         if( xp >= p_last ) return xp - p_last;
00322         return 0; // this should not happen.
00323     };
00324 
00325     const string &getType() const { return a.getType(); };
00326 
00327     void printInfo() const {
00328         EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00329         a.printInfo();
00330         if( is_uniform )
00331             egsInformation(" first plane at %g, %d slices of %g thickness\n",
00332                     p[0],nreg,dp);
00333         else {
00334             egsInformation(" plane positions = ");
00335             for(int j=0; j<nreg; j++) egsInformation("%g ",p[j]);
00336             if( n_plane == nreg ) egsInformation("%g ",p[n_plane]);
00337             egsInformation("\n");
00338         }
00339         egsInformation(
00340                 "=======================================================\n");
00341     };
00342 
00343     EGS_Float position(int j) const { return p[j]; };
00344 
00345     EGS_Vector normal() const { return a.normal(); };
00346 
00347 };

00349 typedef EGS_PlanesT<EGS_XProjector> EGS_PlanesX;
00350 typedef EGS_PlanesT<EGS_YProjector> EGS_PlanesY;
00351 typedef EGS_PlanesT<EGS_ZProjector> EGS_PlanesZ;
00352 typedef EGS_PlanesT<EGS_Projector> EGS_Planes;

00388 class EGS_PLANES_EXPORT EGS_PlaneCollection : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00389 
00390 protected:
00391 
00392     EGS_Planes  **planes;  // the planes.
00393     int         np;        // number of planes.
00394     static string type;
00395 
00396 public:
00397 
00398     EGS_PlaneCollection(int Np, const EGS_Float *pos, const EGS_Vector *norm,
00399             const string &Name = "");
00400     ~EGS_PlaneCollection();
00401     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00402         return (planes[0]->isInside(x) && !planes[np-1]->isInside(x));
00403     };
00404     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00405         if( !planes[0]->isInside(x) ) return -1;
00406         if( planes[np-1]->isInside(x) ) return -1;
00407         for(int j=0; j<np-1; j++)
00408             if( planes[j]->isInside(x) && !planes[j+1]->isInside(x) )
00409                 return j;
00410         return -1; // this should not happen.
00411     };
00412     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isInside(x); };
00413     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00414             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00415         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00416             int m1, m2; EGS_Vector n1, n2;
00417             EGS_Float t1 = t; int i1=planes[ireg]->howfar(0,x,u,t1,&m1,&n1);
00418             EGS_Float t2 = t; int i2=planes[ireg+1]->howfar(-1,x,u,t2,&m2,&n2);
00419             int res = ireg;
00420             if( i1 == -1 && i2 == 0 ) {
00421                 if( t1 < t2 ) {
00422                     t = t1; res = ireg-1; if( normal ) *normal = n1;
00423                 }
00424                 else {
00425                     t = t2; res = ireg+1; if(res > nreg-1) res = -1;
00426                     if( normal ) *normal = n2;
00427                 }
00428             }
00429             else if( i1 == -1 ) {
00430                 t = t1; res = ireg-1; if( normal ) *normal = n1;
00431             }
00432             else if( i2 == 0 ) {
00433                 t = t2; res=ireg+1; if(res > nreg-1) res = -1;
00434                 if( normal ) *normal = n2;
00435             }
00436             if( newmed && res != ireg ) {
00437                 if(res >= 0) *newmed = medium(res); else *newmed = -1;
00438             }
00439             return res;
00440         }
00441         if( !planes[0]->isInside(x) ) {
00442             int iaux = planes[0]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00443             return iaux;
00444         }
00445         int i1 = planes[nreg]->howfar(0,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00446         if( i1 < 0 ) return nreg-1;
00447         return -1;
00448     };
00449     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg,const EGS_Vector &x) {
00450         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00451             EGS_Float t1 = planes[ireg]->hownear(0,x);
00452             EGS_Float t2 = planes[ireg+1]->hownear(-1,x);
00453             if( t1 < t2 ) return t1; else return t2;
00454         }
00455         if( !planes[0]->isInside(x) )
00456             return planes[0]->hownear(-1,x);
00457         return planes[np-1]->hownear(0,x);
00458     };
00459     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00460 
00461     void printInfo() const;
00462 
00463 };
